article: portugal 's parliament voted unanimously on wednesday to condemn the acts of an alleged paedophile ring which reportedly operated out of the nation 's largest orphanage for over three decades with the knowledge of various high-level officials .
abstract: portuguese parliament condemns acts of orphanage paedophile ring
